1189840.name: Bleeding Edge - The Punk Pack
1189840.description:
Pre-purchase Bleeding Edge now to receive the Punk Pack and Closed Beta Access!



You will get:
  • Access to the Bleeding Edge Closed Beta in 2020:
Closed Beta 1 on February 14th
Closed Beta 2 on March 13th
Be the first to play Bleeding Edge before it launches on March 24th!

  • 3 exclusive fighter skins:
Punk Rock Niđhöggr
Butterpunk Buttercup
Outrider ZeroCool

  • Rioter’s Hoverboard
  • Make Your Mark in-game Sticker Pack
  • 3 bonus taunts

Illustrations may vary from in-game versions.
1189840.supported_languages:
英语*, 法语, 意大利语, 德语, 西班牙语 - 西班牙, 阿拉伯语, 丹麦语, 荷兰语, 芬兰语, 日语, 韩语, 挪威语, 波兰语, 葡萄牙语 - 葡萄牙, 葡萄牙语 - 巴西, 俄语, 简体中文, 瑞典语, 繁体中文, 土耳其语
*具有完全音频支持的语言
